oass.ShortestPath

class oass.ShortestPath.EdgeProbModel(G: oass.StaticDirectedAcyclicGraph.StaticDirectedAcyclicGraph)[source]

Bases: torch.nn.modules.module.Module

A simple model designed for path planing.

G

The graph. This model will create a parameter representing the probability for each edge in G.

Type

StaticDirectedAcyclicGraph

forward()[source]

This model has no input layers.

training: bool
